mapper.update: create table ${site}_${category}_keyword_hit ( timeid varchar(11), keyword varchar(128), hit int, primary key (timeid, keyword) )
mapper.select: select timeid, keyword, hit from ${site}_${category}_keyword_hit limit 1
select * from ${site}_${category}_hit where timeId=#{timeId} and keyword=#{keyword}
select * from ${site}_${category}_hit where keyword=#{keyword} and timeId like '${dType}%' and timeId=(select min(timeId) from ${site}_${category}_hit) limit 1
select * from ${site}_${category}_hit where keyword=#{keyword} and timeId like '${dType}%' and timeId=(select max(timeId) from ${site}_${category}_hit) limit 1

select keyword from ${site}_${category}_hit
and keyword like '%${keyword}%'
and timeId between #{from} and #{to}
group by keyword
mapper.update: update ${site}_${category}_hit set hit = #{hit} where timeId = #{timeId} and keyword = #{keyword}
mapper.delete: delete ${site}_${category}_hit set hit = #{hit} where timeId = #{timeId} and keyword = #{keyword}
